UCR - Computer Science and Engineering May 5  ·  Bourns College of Engineering at UC Riverside May 5 Data science earned a spot as a top trending career in LinkedIn’s 2020 Emerging Jobs Report. If you or someone you know is interested in pursuing data science,  ... join us this Saturday, May 8 for Women in Data Science (WiDS) Riverside. As part of the annual WiDS Worldwide conference organized by Stanford University and more than 150 locations, the event features outstanding women doing outstanding work in the field. UCR - Computer Science and Engineering March 3  ·  Bourns College of Engineering at UC Riverside March 3 Huge congratulations to BCOE professional student organization Cyber@UCR for taking home the number one spot in the Western Regional Collegiate Cyber Defense Co ... mpetition. They outscored teams from Stanford, Arizona State, UCSD, UCI, and many more. Read about how they're preparing for the next round of competition at regionals. UCR - Computer Science and Engineering February 8  ·  UCR's Cyber Club Defense Team placed first during Western Regionals Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition! Congratulations!!! Western Regional Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition February 7 WRCCDC is proud to announce the winners of WRCCDC Qualifiers 2021! The top eight teams will move onto the regional. We have worked hard to make sure this proces ... s is clear and transparent! Congratulations to all competitors who competed and we hope you had fun! And look forward to seeing you in person next year!
